article_title: Yes, Marco Rubio's Obamacare Replacement Plan -- Tax Credits -- Is An Individual Mandate

article_metadata.description: A universal health-insurance tax credit would be even broader and more punitive than ObamaCare's individual mandate.
article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon

og.description: A universal health-insurance tax credit would be even broader and more punitive than ObamaCare's individual mandate.
